mapper.select: select * from f_festival order by festival_num
select * from f_board order by board_num
select mem_num, mem_id, mem_nickname, mem_admin from f_member order by mem_num
mapper.update: update f_festival set festival_name=#{festival_name}, festival_start=#{festival_start}, festival_end=#{festival_end}, festival_hpage=#{festival_hpage}, festival_theme=#{festival_theme}, festival_time=#{festival_time}, festival_count=#{festival_count}, festival_content=#{festival_content}, city_num=#{city_num} where festival_num=#{festival_num}
update f_board set board_head=#{board_head}, board_date=#{board_date}, festival_num=#{festival_num} where board_num=#{board_num}
update f_member set mem_id=#{mem_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_nickname=#{mem_nickname} where mem_num=#{mem_num}
